name: Draw A Box
description:
Anyone can Draw a Box. But how many boxes can YOU draw!?

Draw a box is a unique / simple yet skill based game testing your ability on drawing the Perfect Box!

The game objective is deceptively simple, but you will be surprised how difficult it is to actually draw a nice box, and how such a simple concept can be such an addicting game mechanic!

At the end of it, you'll also improve your freestyle box drawing skills ;)

Try to achieve a high score, unlock all the secret characters and all the 5 game modes!

No similar games out there like this! Definitely worth giving it a try!
